attributes.additional_details: As a Pensioner myself and my Wife we think that Pensioners on a fixed  income, like others feel that all Pensions should better index linked as not only the Businesses and Govenments seem to care where we find the money to keep paying these increases, like Gas Electricity, Petrol or Diesel, more so for the Blue Badge holders as they need to keep a car to get about in, for shopping and pleasure. A lot of Pensioners are Blue Badge holders.
